```{r cars}
# Import
load("aft_results_no_fruc.RData")
# See if CI covers 0
sig = lapply(names(results),function(m){
    mod = results[[m]]
    mod = tidy(mod,conf.int = T,conf.method = "perc")
    if (mod[mod$term == "tnie","conf.low"] <= 0 & mod[mod$term == "tnie","conf.high"] >= 0){
      return(NA)
    } else {
      return(m)
    }
  })
# Remove NAs
sig = sig[!is.na(sig)]
```
